id.description: The unique identifier of the custom field

name.description: The name or label of the custom field

field_type.description: The type of field (e.g., text, number, dropdown, etc.)

value_type.description: The type of value the custom field accepts (e.g., string, integer, boolean, etc.)

created_at.description: The date and time when the custom field was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the custom field was last updated
